thread.title: Russian athletes sent home from SKorea for inflight incident
thread.title_full: Russian athletes sent home from SKorea for inflight incident

title: Russian athletes sent home from SKorea for inflight incident
text:
Russian athletes, trainers sent home from SKorea for allegedly being drunk and rowdy on plane THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   4:29   4:29   
Subjects: 
East Asia (691) 

SEOUL, South Korea â€” Nine Russian athletes, trainers and journalists have been sent back home from South Korea after allegedly being drunk and rowdy on a plane. 
Police say the Russians had been barred from entering South Korea shortly after arriving at Incheon International Airport aboard a Korean Air flight on Thursday to attend a military sports competition. 
Police say the Russians made loud noises and blocked off an aisle in protest after crew members refused to serve them more alcohol. 
Police officers say the Russian group includes two female swimmers, both active duty soldiers who had planned to compete at the Military World Games that are to open in the South Korean city of Mungyeong on Friday. 
The Justice Ministry confirmed the departure of the Russians on Friday.
